title: Lily-Rose Depp goes make-up free as she grabs coffee in Los Angeles
text:
She made her romance with Timothee Chalamet official earlier this year, after being linked for months.

But Lily-Rose Depp enjoyed a solo outing on Tuesday to grab some coffees from a trendy cafe while going make-up free in Los Angeles.

The actress, 20, kept things casual for the excursion, as she kept off the winter chill by wearing a blue fleece jacket over a white logo T-Shirt.

Comfy: Lily-Rose Depp went make-up free and kept things casual in a fleece jacket and light-wash denim jeans as she grabbed coffee in Los Angeles on Tuesday

Lily-Rose completed her look by wearing a pair of light-wash denim jeans and white trainers, while she kept her personal items in a black handbag.

The King star swept her brunette locks back into a messy bun and chose to highlight her natural beauty by going make-up free.

Strolling along the quiet streets of the City Of Angels, Lily-Rose looked relaxed as she headed home with a cup of coffee in either hand.

Rumours of a romance between Lily-Rose and Timothee began to swirl at the end of 2018 when fans caught the pair cosying up around New York City, walking with their arms around each other.

Casual: The King star swept her brunette locks back into a messy bun and chose to highlight her natural beauty by going make-up free

The young star has previously dodged confirming the romance rumours with Lily-Rose, but he did once tell a reporter at Access Hollywood that she made him speechless.

Last month the pair were seen packing on the PDA with each other on a yacht as they spent time together on holiday in Capri.

Lily-Rose and Timonthee are routinely spotted by fan accounts on 'dates' around Paris and New York, but sent the gossip mill into overdrive when they stepped out together at the Venice Film Festival earlier this year.

The two met on Netflix's The King with Lily playing Timothee's on-screen wife, Catherine of Valois, he plays King Henry V.

Earlier this month, Lily revealed that sharing the screen with the Beautiful Boy actor in their new movie was 'nerve-wracking' because he's so talented.

She said': 'It's always exciting to work with somebody who you know has given themselves so wholeheartedly to their role and is so invested.

'It can be nerve-wracking to work with people whose talent you admire so much, but hopefully it can only make things better...

'It can be intimidating. But I think you can take it like that, or like, "How lucky am I to be working with so many people who are so great at what they do, and hopefully I can learn from them."'

Love story: Romance rumours between Lily-Rose and Timothee Chalamet began to swirl at the end of 2018, the pair met on set of Netflix film The King, in which she plays Catherine of Valois
description: The actress, 20, enjoyed a solo outing without beau Timothee Chalamet on Tuesday  to grab some coffees from a trendy cafe while going make-up free in Los Angeles.
